Reviews.Title: Good personal alarm. So-so door alarm.
Reviews.Author: Kennor
Reviews.Content: It is very loud and easy to use as a personal alarm.  But as a door alarm, the clip really is too thin - no door closes so tightly that you can slip the clip in and keep the two pieces touch so the alarm does not go off with the door closed. I taped a piece of non-slip pad on the side of the door to make it work. But if you intend to use it in a hotel, I guess you have to bring little things like that otherwise you won't be able to use it.

Reviews.Title: Alarming Alarm
Reviews.Author: Stan Baker
Reviews.Content: Kept my cameras from being snatched more than once! And once security was able to stop the thief and recover them in the parking lot!!

Reviews.Title: Not very loud
Reviews.Author: Sierratango
Reviews.Content: I bought this to alert me if anyone tries to open my tool box on my truck at night, but it isn't very loud.  It would probably scare the intruder away, but I'm a somewhat heavy sleeper and this probably wouldn't wake me up inside my house unless I was in a room right next to the truck - which I'm not.I've used these types of alarms made by a different manufacturer (don't know which) and it was so loud you were racing to either turn it off or get away from it.Maybe I got a defective unit and the one you buy will be better, but maybe not.

Reviews.Title: Personal or Home Alarm Best and Loud sound.
Reviews.Author: Carol
Reviews.Content: Great alarm. Extremely loud. Comes with a few different ways to mount it and have it work. For a personal alarm or a quick attach or quick dis-attach, and loudness, it's perfect!
